projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light mode, MDX blog system, and optimized performance.
projects.longDescription: This portfolio website showcases modern web development techniques with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience. Built with Next.js 13+ App Router and styled with Tailwind CSS, it features a complete blog system using MDX, dark/light mode switching, and comprehensive SEO optimization.
highlights: Server-side rendering with Next.js App Router
MDX-powered blog system with syntax highlighting
SEO optimization and social media meta tags

projects.title: Remote Agent Demo
projects.description: A demonstration project showcasing remote agent capabilities and distributed system architecture. Built with modern web technologies and cloud deployment.
projects.longDescription: This project demonstrates advanced concepts in distributed systems and remote agent architecture. It showcases how to build scalable, cloud-native applications with proper separation of concerns and modern deployment practices.

projects.title: QDJR Personal Website
projects.description: A personal website and portfolio built with Nuxt.js, featuring modern design, responsive layout, and optimized performance. Showcases projects and professional information.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive personal website built with Nuxt.js that serves as both a portfolio and professional presence. Features modern design principles, responsive layout, and optimized performance with server-side rendering and static generation capabilities.
highlights: Built with Nuxt.js for optimal performance

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light mode, MDX blog, and optimized performance.
projects.longDescription: This portfolio website showcases modern web development techniques with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience. Built with Next.js 13+ App Router and styled with Tailwind CSS, it features a complete blog system using MDX, dark/light mode switching, and comprehensive SEO optimization.

projects.title: API Documentation Tool
projects.description: A tool for generating beautiful API documentation from OpenAPI specifications with interactive examples and code snippets.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive API documentation generator that transforms OpenAPI specifications into beautiful, interactive documentation. Features include live API testing, code generation in multiple languages, authentication handling, and customizable themes.

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Real-time chat application with rooms, private messaging, file sharing, and emoji reactions built with Socket.io.
projects.longDescription: A feature-rich real-time chat application supporting multiple chat rooms, private messaging, file sharing, emoji reactions, and user presence indicators. Built with modern web technologies and optimized for performance and scalability.
